TEXT.TITLE: FIRST FEDERAL <FFSD.O> TO TAKE WRITEOFF
TEXT.BODY: First Federal Savings Bank said it will take a 274,000 dlr or 25 ct per share writeoff of its secondary reserve with the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corp in the third quartger ending June 30. Reuter
